description:
Satou Sakie is a http://anidb.net/t2143 [succubus] who works as a math teacher. Due to the aphrodisiac her body produces, she constantly has to take precautions to avoid inadvertently seducing her male students, such as wearing a tracksuit and taking early trains. While her nature as a succubus leads several males to become attracted to her, she herself develops a crush on http://anidb.net/ch86021 [Tetsuo].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Satou Sakie
